name: GetTotalSepaFileByPayrollRunId
description:
__Activity name :__ GetTotalSepaFileByPayrollRunId

Returns the total SEPA payments file as a XML file. This file contains the payments of all the available SEPA payment files available for the specified payroll run.

payrollrunId.description: The unique identifier of the payroll run

Authorization.description: A valid Bearer token for authorizing the request.

Accept.description: The accept header is used to influence what type of output is returned and in most cases the version of the output

paymentType.description:
Indicates the type of payment for the SEPA file.
In case salary is selected the following will be included in the SEPA xml file
```
  <CtgyPurp>
    <Cd>SALA</Cd>
  </CtgyPurp>
```

batchBooking.description:
Determines whether the Batch Booking \<BtchBookg\> tag is included in the SEPA file and if it is which value it is set to.  By defualt this value is set to Exclude.

Possible values for this parameter are:
- Exclude: Do not include \<BtchBookg\> tag in SEPA file
- IncludeTrue: Include \<BtchBookg\> tag in SEPA file and set it to 'True'
- IncludeFalse: Include \<BtchBookg\> tag in SEPA file and set it to 'False'

requestedExecutionDate.description: This value is used when creating the sepa file to set the value of \<ReqdExctnDt\>

$ul: **obsoleteDate**: The date (can be null) on which the `resourceVersion` is no longer supported/available
**resourceVersion**: The resource version of the object in the response
